tools.title: Strong Password Generator
tools.description: Instantly generate secure, customizable passwords client-side with options for length, complexity and entropy visualization.

tools.title: UUID Generator
tools.description: Create RFC4122-compliant UUIDs (v1, v4, v5) instantly, with optional namespace support.

tools.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
tools.description: Produce realistic placeholder text of any length—control paragraphs, words and formatting for design mockups.

tools.title: Text Counter
tools.description: Get real-time counts of words, characters, sentences and lines for any text input with detailed analytics.

tools.title: Text Case Converter
tools.description: Switch between UPPERCASE, lowercase, Title Case, snake_case, camelCase and more with one click.

tools.title: Markdown Converter
tools.description: Live-edit Markdown and convert to clean HTML or export as Markdown, complete with syntax highlighting.

tools.title: Text Diff Checker
tools.description: Compare two text blocks side-by-side and highlight additions, deletions and changes for effortless proofreading.

tools.title: Regex Tester
tools.description: Build, test and debug regular expressions with real-time match highlighting and a library of common patterns.

tools.title: JSON Formatter & Validator
tools.description: Validate, beautify, minify and lint JSON instantly in your browser with real-time error reporting.

tools.title: Data Converter: CSV, JSON, YAML & XML
tools.description: Transform data between CSV, JSON, YAML and XML formats in seconds—even large datasets—all client-side.

tools.title: Code Formatter & Minifier
tools.description: Beautify or compress HTML, CSS and JavaScript code for readability or performance gains—no uploads, no server.

tools.title: SEO Meta Tag Generator
tools.description: Generate optimized meta tags, Open Graph and Twitter card snippets to boost search visibility and social sharing.

tools.title: Sitemap Generator
tools.description: Create XML sitemaps with unlimited URLs, customizable changefreq and priority—improve SEO indexing fast.

tools.title: URL Tools: Encode, Parse & Slugify
tools.description: Encode/decode URLs, parse components and generate SEO-friendly slugs directly in your browser.

tools.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
tools.description: Convert text and files to and from Base64 with drag-and-drop support—no server, fully client-side.

tools.title: JWT & Hash Generator
tools.description: Decode JWTs and generate cryptographic hashes (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, bcrypt) with adjustable parameters.

tools.title: HTML to PDF Converter
tools.description: Render any webpage or HTML snippet into a PDF document client-side with custom layout and margins.

tools.title: PDF Toolkit: Compress & Convert
tools.description: Shrink PDF file sizes without quality loss and extract text to Word documents—all in-browser and offline.

tools.title: Image Toolkit: Compress & Resize
tools.description: Optimize JPEG/PNG images and resize with optional aspect-ratio lock—fast, free and privacy-focused.

tools.title: QR Code Generator
tools.description: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, vCards and Wi-Fi credentials with color and size options.

tools.title: Unit Converter
tools.description: Convert length, weight, temperature, volume, time and more between metric & imperial units instantly.

tools.title: Color Toolkit: Converter & Contrast Checker
tools.description: Translate colors between HEX, RGB, HSL & CMYK and verify WCAG-compliant contrast ratios easily.

tools.title: Time Converter: UNIX & Timezone
tools.description: Convert UNIX timestamps to human-readable dates and adjust across world time zones seamlessly.
